name: Vengeance, a level for Sven Co-op
name_original: Vengeance, a level for Sven Co-op
description:
"Vengeance" by Anton Risberg

A level for the Sven Co-Op mod for Half-Life,

An homage to Quake 2

Models by Anton Risberg and Imp

Sounds by Anton Risberg

Made to be finished in a month in late 2014, last looked at in the middle of 2015 before the breakdown of the computer it was on.

again found after a many months of searching, and quickly, finished? ( No... but maybe one day) during 7dfps 2020

Enjoy your battles against the Cyber Lords!
